arguments.info: name - (Required) The name for the user.
password - (Required) The password for the user.
admin - (Optional) Mark the user as admin.

attributes.info: admin - (Bool) indication if the user is an admin or not.

arguments.info: name - (Required) The name for the continuous_query. This must be unique on the InfluxDB server.
database - (Required) The database for the continuous_query. This must be an existing influxdb database.
